schema.title: Response List Active Initiatives Initiatives Active Get
Response Get Actions By Initiative Actions By Initiative  Initiative Id  Get
Response List Categories Config Categories Get

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users from the database.

post.description:
Create a new user in the database.
Validates required fields and checks for duplicate emails.

get.description:
Retrieve a user by their unique ID.
Raises 404 if the user is not found.

patch.description:
Update an existing user's information.
Checks for email uniqueness and applies partial updates.
Raises 404 if the user is not found.

delete.description:
Delete a user by their unique ID.
Raises 404 if the user is not found.
